questions.question: What is the theme of Aesop's Fable The Fox and the Stork?

choices.answer: Don't invite people to dinner if you know they can't eat it.
The fox did the stork wrong, so the stork got him back.
Treat others how you would like to be treated.
When you have a beak, you can't eat off of a plate.

questions.question: What is the theme of Aesop's Fable The Knight and the Charger?

choices.answer: Take care of those who have taken care of you.
Don't turn your horse into a donkey.
The knight mistreated his horse when he didn't need it.
Treat your horse how you would want to be treated.

questions.question: What is the central idea of this newspaper article?

choices.answer: Debates about chores.
Most people disagree.
Some people think kids should get paid for doing chores.
There is a debate about kids getting paid for chores.

questions.question: What is the central idea of this article?

choices.answer: Feeling Froggy
Biology Club students were feeling froggy
Biology club students are working to save amphibians.
Students are in biology club.

questions.question: What is the central idea of this video clip?

choices.answer: Gabby knew what she needed in order to become great.
You have to follow your dreams.
Gabby Douglas followed her dreams.
Gabby Douglas and her mom worked hard.

questions.question: What is the central idea of this video clip?

choices.answer: Second graders do fun things.
The second grade class in learning about planets.
The second grade class is playing with balloons.
A second grade class is on the school news.

questions.question: What is the central idea of this article?

choices.answer: Children can be good scientists.
There are some soccer fields that are more toxic than others
Clair is interested in science.
Claire tests water samples from soccer fields.

questions.question: What is the theme of this video clip?

choices.answer: Success takes hard work and dedication.
You have to work out if you want to be a fighter.
Just because you failed doesn't make you a failure.
You have to run until you die.

questions.question: What is the theme of this clip from the movie The Pursuit of Happyness?

choices.answer: Don't judge a book by its cover.
Everybody deserves a chance.
Making a good impression is about more than looks.
Will Smith is a great actor.

questions.question: What is the theme of this music video?

choices.answer: Women shouldn't wear makeup.
You don't have try so hard.
Girls don't have to do so much to try to be liked by others.
She doesn't like wearing makeup.

questions.question: What is the theme of this commercial?

choices.answer: Girls should not be ashamed of who they are.
Stop saying "like a girl."
Doing things "like a girl" shouldn't be an insult.
You should never throw like a girl.
